about_the_game:
Meet The Bofyne Unit, a special team of western themed cosplayers who boasts of an extremely high success rate for various services such as Body Guarding, Item Retrieval, and “Message Sending” Nothing stands in the way of a successful mission, not even laws! Being a well-known successful 4-hire team, Cosbattle Champion Besticca has tasked The Bofyne Unit with the dismantling of a rival cosbattler, a ruthless high powered mecha cosplayer who has publicly made a vow to “Bring Besticca to her knees”. Will the Bofyne Unit be able to take down the mysterious mechanized threat ,only known as Omega before the cosbattle championship or will this be the end of the line for the team?!

Features

Fast pace and exciting unique story!

Voice acted driven narrative!

Very interesting and lovable cast of misfits!

The "Free-Turn" Battle system, allowing flexibility in traditional turn-based battling!

Over the Top -Flashy abilities and combos!

8 to 10 hrs of main storyline gameplay with additional fun side quests to do!

A very Snazzy soundtrack featuring many genres of music! ( Country, Rock, Hiphop, Pop)

name: Bofyne Unit : The Omega Contract

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx 1070
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1660
